remarks: Unicity of the middle point, expressed with point inversion.  Theorem 7.17 of [Schwabhauser] p. 51.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mirval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
mirval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
mirval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
mirval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
mirval.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
mirval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
miduniq.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
miduniq.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
miduniq.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
miduniq.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
miduniq.e $e |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` A ) ` X ) = Y ) $.
miduniq.f $e |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` B ) ` X ) = Y ) $.
miduniq $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
